title: Jhin skin Ideas
body:
Get this post to 4444 upvotes to show jhin some love :)

http://imgur.com/bk8Oc94

CREATOR: Zeocelot (on twitter)

replies.body: Ooh I love the blue take on Heartseeker/Heartbreaker :D

Roses are Red
Violet's are blue
Heart Seeker is dead
Make Heart Breaker soon™?

while thats on your mind you should consider hearbreaker vi and jinx 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

I MEAN- YES?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=5WxsrIY2,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-01-07T03:16:54.839+0000)
>
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
> 
> I MEAN- YES?

Show it to the skins team Riot so they can make something happen :)
um..why not heart breaker jhin and jinx :-(
Yes, please! Jinx and Vi did not get a skin for a long time! /Kappa

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=5WxsrIY2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-06T21:47:54.194+0000)
>
> Ooh I love the blue take on Heartseeker/Heartbreaker :D

Heartbreaker will be soo awesome :)

MAKE IT HAPPEN RIOT :)
Do I downvote the comment at 5 likes to get it to 4... or do I upvote it in the hopes it goes to 16... choices.
16? Those are rookie numbers. Real pros go 4444
Here's the original artist: https://twitter.com/ZeOcelot/status/700374415666614272

No the ultimate skin idea for Jhin:

Golfer Jhin.

* Struts like preppy golfer
* Has caddy/bag on his shoulder in place of his hump
* Q is bouncing golfball
* W is just a really fast golfball
* E makes small bunkers that explode with sand
* R turns the area into a massive green fairway and he hits golfballs at people
* In place of the small bits of opera music he gets soothing golf claps and cheers
* Autos make him putt golfballs at people
* The mark for his W is a little circle of the golf holes/flags
yes

Okay but... Phantom (of The Opera) Jhin skin though.

~~Please Riot, give my husband more skins.~~

He is mine! 
Fite me

> [{quoted}](name=AndreiRayanovsky,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=5WxsrIY2,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2017-01-07T02:29:19.641+0000)
>
> He is mine! 
> Fite me

https://t3.rbxcdn.com/2130910a5f0ef78ee56876bbeac2eb7e

You sure?

Yes, yes i am.
http://static.zerochan.net/Gasai.Yuno.full.1694584.jpg
Can you link the original artiest please ? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
found it! https://twitter.com/zeocelot/status/700374415666614272
click the image for the link to the twitter
You can search google by image. As a struggling artiest myself its really annoying that you're getting attention for something you didn't do/draw.

> [{quoted}](name=Limid,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=5WxsrIY2,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2017-01-07T01:36:32.477+0000)
>
> You can search google by image. As a struggling artiest myself its really annoying that you're getting attention for something you didn't do/draw.

Well i found it on instagram somewhere and i had to post it here 
No ofence to the creator but i dont know who he is plus i didnt found it on google
I had to do a double take on Heartbreaker, it looked a lot like Garen from my peripheral vision. The concepts look wonderful though!
i thought a Bioforge skin would be epic for him, but havent tried to draw a concept of it yet, think of the ult shots on his arm being the Green capsules filled with that stuff.
Love the heart breaker!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Spec Ops is my favorite. I love all of them though.
I like that one too. Reminds me of the Project series of skins~
I think Artic Ops Jhin would be the coolest skin ever.
Yeah, thats probably my favorite of all the ideas I've heard and seen. But this Sigil skin here is pretty fricken cool too.
now to upvote everything to {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}}

These are perfection and presented in the perfect number. Totally Jhin approved.

{{champion:202}} "Four!"

I like the artist one!
I imagine him with a paint ball bazooka ult
very nice stuff, +1
Sick designs, would love to see any of these make it into the game one day. {{champion:202}}  has such huge skin potential.
Blank canvas should have blood spray in every colour.

> [{quoted}](name=FeeNeeX,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=5WxsrIY2,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-06T21:22:09.275+0000)
>
> Get this post to 4444 upvotes to show jhin some love :)
> http://imgur.com/bk8Oc94

How about 4 upvotes? That'd make more sense.
it's beautiful how there are no more than 4 upvotes for each post :D
If Cottontail Jhin (think Frank from Donnie Darko) ever comes out, I will buy it day one. Promise.
The Heartbreaker one is so awesome!

I must admit those idea are nice. They all look nice and original. Love them all!

But I'll admit it, Im a bit bitter and envious. Being posting a few skins idea on the boards (with drawing even, like my latest idea: Garden Gnome Kled), never had a Rioter tell me they liked my ideas XD
Sigil looks fucking awesome.
i would throw rp at riot for that sigil
If any of these skins became a real thing I would probably buy them instantly :)
I really like the Blank canvas idea.
Those bottom 2 look pretty nice -- maybe they could do a whole gargoyle type line of skins to go with the sigil one you have.
**SIGIL IS MY FAV :O**
Artist skins! I wish we had some by now! I like the idea of Jhin throwing paint blobs
The blank canvas is a really cool idea
